saying: Nail polish is thicker than water.
description: Mathilda is a snooty, kangaroo villager in the Animal Crossing series who has appeared in almost every game so far, except for Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. Her name, as well as being a popular girl's name, especially in Australia, is a reference to "Waltzing Matilda," the unofficial national anthem of Australia, where kangaroos live. Her initial catchphrase, "wee baby," refers to her joey.
